text:
Airteam - We are looking for a Front-end Dev and a Python Dev for Django projects. The roles are Sydney based for onsite projects - can be permanent or contract.

More info on the roles and what we are about Python Dev --> https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/cap/view/263622758/ Front-end Dev --> https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/cap/view/263625049/

If you donâ€™t want to apply on LinkedIn you can email me on laura [at] airteam.com.au. I look after getting new crew onboard - no recruiters, we like to handle everything ourselves. We do a behavioral based interview to learn more about your skills and experience. Thanks!
